entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
